授業方法:
The format, schedule, and number of graded assignments or activities may change during the semester depending on student needs, interests, and numbers 

The main focus of this course will be on reading skills development, but we will also develop students' speaking and listening skills. Students will engage in active learning: working individually, in pairs, groups and as a whole class around assigned reading tasks in order to improve academic and language skills. 

The class will be conducted face-to-face. Assignments/homework/assessments will be conducted, and lesson information/resources provided, on Google Classroom. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. BYOD to class is recommended.


In order to maximize the use of class time, students will complete all reading assignments at home, then engage in pair and group work, discussion, and presentation activities in class. This course will center around 'literature circles', in which students will read and discuss a common topic/book with their group.
